description: This file defines an Android activity named OssListActivity which displays a static list of open-source libraries used in the app, along with a menu option to navigate to a Settings activity.

classes.name: OssListActivity
classes.description: An AppCompatActivity that displays a list of open-source libraries and handles menu actions.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the layout, configures the toolbar, and populates the content TextView with open-source license information.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the menu from the menu resource file.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selections, starting SettingsActivity when the settings option is selected.
